span.strong: USD 377 Board of Education meeting Live Stream

p.strong: Due to the Shelter at Home Ordinance, our hours of operation have changed. Phones will be answered from 8:30-2:00 on Monday, Tuesday, Thursday & Friday. All facilities will be closed Wednesdays for deep cleaning, no phones will be answered on this day. We will continue our Free Lunch daily.Â Thank you for your understanding.Â
